item.title: TOPOTECAN
item.description:
DrugBank ID: db01030
DrugCentral: topotecan
Synonymous :9-[(dimethylamino)methyl]-10-hydroxy-(4s)-camptothecin | topotecan | topotecane | topotecanum


Drug Sentece Context


Table 1. Analysis of context sentence of topotecan gene in 9 abstracts.

pmid sentence
12892825 The purpose of this study was to examine the antiproliferative potentialities of a pool of new generation compounds (Paclitaxel, Docetaxel, Gemcitabine, Topotecan, SN-38) together with fenretinide, a synthetic derivative of retinoic acid, in comparison with the current first choice treatment cisplatin molecule, on a pool of human malignant pleural mesothelioma cell lines derived from either bioptic and pleural effusions samples.
22578202 In the current study, the combination of i.v. topotecan and pegylated liposomal doxorubicin (PLD) in advanced multi-treated MPM was tested. […] The treatment included topotecan 1.2 mg/m2 i.v. on Days 1 - 3 and PLD 40 mg/m2 on Day 4, every 28 days. […] The chosen dose of the topotecan/ PLD combination was well-tolerated with no Grade 3/4 toxicities. […] The current study shows a significant palliative effect of the topotecan/ PLD combination in pretreated patients with advanced MPM.
9856666 The North Central Cancer Treatment Group designed a phase II trial to assess the efficacy and toxicity of topotecan in patients with unresectable malignant pleural mesothelioma. […] Nineteen men and three women, median age 66 years (range, 44-78 years), were treated with topotecan 1.5 mg/m2 intravenously over 30 minutes daily for 5 days at 3-week intervals until toxicity, progression of disease, or a patient decided to discontinue treatment. […] Topotecan as administered in this trial is reasonably well tolerated; however, the response rate was insufficient to warrant additional study in pleural mesothelioma.
